Use TypeScript.
Use only shadcn component i have added the mcp server also
Use Semtanics tage whenever possible
Add meta data for SEO
Use React functional components.
Use TailwindCSS for all styling.
Do not use inline CSS.
Do not use default exports.
keep stories components in its own folder.
Use semantic HTML wherever possible.
Keep components small and reusable.
Prefer async/await.
Follow consistent naming: camelCase for variables and functions, PascalCase for components.
Generate clean, minimal code without unnecessary abstractions.
Do not write any comments in code.
Do not create any markdown or readme files.
Global components go in the global components folder.
Page specific components go in the page components folder.
Add only global components to the storybook.
Use responsive design principles.
Use mobile first design.
